title: Roget博士的人事档案
content:
[[=]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-rogets-file/Ialwaysfeellikesomebody'swatchingme.gif]]
[[/=]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-rogets-file/HallofFame.gif]]


[[tabview]]
[[tab 人事档案和SCP文档工作卷宗]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-rogets-file/droget.png|caption={{Roget博士在--玩--工作的照相。}}|width=400px]]

**姓名：**{{Ralph J. Roget博士}}

**安保权限：**{{3级}}

**职务：**{{Site副主管}}

**当前所处：**{{[[[secure-facility-dossier-site-77| Site-77]]]}}

**历史：**{{Roget博士自16歲開始於Site-77工作後就一直是其重要的資產，5年來，他位處文書職位的工作，直到Gillespie主管認為他已經證明了自己，並且提拔他為止。他的新工作涉及大量他所擅長的Safe和Euclid級項目文件。儘管以莽撞闻名以及被認為是親戚偏袒的謠言，他在Site-77的職位還是十分穩固。}}

**已知亲属：**{{Gillespie主管（祖母）、Stanley Gillespie（祖父，已殁） 、特工Lis Boyd（同母异父的姐妹）、Robert J. Boyd博士（同母异父的兄弟）。}}

> 注意：Roget博士的名字不是发Rogay、Rogat、Rogain、Roggers、Reject、Ragazzo、Regret、rigrog、Rogizzle、Roger、Roarg、Riggy?、roy get、rogit、Rojét、torgeti、dodget、cocaine或Rights的音。请不要在提及Roget博士时使用这些发音
> ^^拜托~各位，这没那么难^^

[[tab Vang博士的贡献]]
欢笑先生是我最爱的玩具　　　　{{//Mister Laugh's my favorite toy//}}
Wondertainment的骄傲与乐趣@@  @@{{//Wondertainment's pride and joy//}}
我小小先生列表的第三位　　　　{{//Third upon my Misters list//}}
总是使我口头变歪　　　　　　　{{//Always making verbal twists//}}
每一字都是私藏笑料　　　　　　{{//Every word's a private joke//}}
破了我肠直到它坏掉　　　　　　{{//Bust my gut until it's broke//}}
许多玩具充足了他的所有者　　　{{//Many toys abound his person//}}
但，唉，他的心情是更坏的　　　{{//But alas, his mood does worsen//}}

他仍然是好笑的　　　　　　　　{{//He remains hilarious//}}
但我想要合群的　　　　　　　　{{//But, I want gregarious//}}
快乐是一个小丑应有地　　　　　{{//Happy's how a clown should be//}}
这一个就不是我所想的　　　　　{{//This one's just not right to me//}}
或许当我少偷笑　　　　　　　　{{//Maybe when I chuckle less//}}
然后我就开始默许　　　　　　　{{//Then, I'll start to acquiesce//}}
欢笑先生认为他该走了　　　　　{{//Mister Laugh thinks he should go//}}
但他仍有趣，可不是嘛　　　　　{{//But he's still funny, don't you know//}}

当手头开始变紧　　　　　　　　{{//When the money's getting tight//}}
当我真的感受到它的啃咬　　　　{{//When I really feel its bite//}}
我该走了，他也跟我一起走　　　{{//I'll go, he'll go with me too//}}
到马戏团或动物园　　　　　　　{{//To the circus or the zoo//}}
然后我秀了下他的诙谐笑话　　　{{//And I'll show his witty jests//}}
给渴望客官的人们　　　　　　　{{//To the crowds of eager guests//}}
噢，这计划会让我有钱的　　　　{{//Oh, this plan will make me rich//}}
在门口的是- 狗娘养的…　　　　 {{//At the door is- son of a bitch…//}}

[[tab 作者遗愿]]

* 重写：如果我不在而且有个我的SCP分数到了+5以下，那它可以由由任一工作人员成员重写，或者是工作认为能够进行重写的人。如果可能的话，我想保存我被删除的文件的副本，虽然我长时间消失的话我就不会为保存我的垃圾而负担着你们全部。

* 买卖：只要是我所有的，任何人能对我的东西作任何事。

* 重申作者身份：好的，数名工作人员的成员知道我是谁和我看来是怎样，所以他们能认出我。Moose知道我目前的电邮，Scantron在推特和Youtube追踪我。如果都失效了，Reject、Scantron、thedeadlymoose、TroyL、Kens和Drewbear有我的手机号码。

* 其他：任何人需经我的许可使用我的东西。故事、SCP的参考资料、用在游戏、视频、诸如此类。既然归于我，你能暴跳如雷。

[[tab SCP评注]]
__SCP-1507__

这是我第一个成功的文档。我才因有个SCP的大失败，并试着找到些我很了解的，以便我能打从心底写作。我抬眼看了我那时的书桌，然后看到我妈的其中一只粉红火烈鸟在外面凝视着我。我想“噢，那能作个很酷的文章”然后写了它。我得到MisterBibs的协助，我总永远感激他协助了我的第一篇SCP文档。如果不是他的引导，这里就不会有今天的我。

__SCP-5200-J__

基本上，我在学校时就有个关于“**就说不**”-J的点子。我回到家并开工了，然后不久停在了描述部分之前。我传到聊天室并问“它目前为止看来如何？Salman Corbette当时在场，他认为很好笑。然后他求我立刻上传。所以我干了。在10分钟后，我有了篇成功的-J。

__SCP-2600-EX__

这个来自dexanote在batcave所贴的毛皮鳟鱼神话，且跟某人说把它弄成一个SCP。当时我正前往西弗吉尼亚度假，车程让我无聊疲惫。**所以**我拿出我的手机然后开始撰写它。那花了7个小时，且这是我用手机写的唯一一个。原版有些奇怪的对话，但我已帮助它了。我对目前的版本感到自豪。

还有，SCP-2600-EX和5200-J的编号来自雅达利游戏机。

__SCP-1799__ 

这是我最受欢迎的SCP，以及我最自豪的一个。它基本产生是因为我已跟Sal在完成5200-J后谈话且问我是否能写篇小小先生。在检查了列表后，我决定了欢笑先生，大部分是因为他似乎是最显著具体外表的候选：一位小丑。在看完其它小小先生跟收藏家故事后，我让他成为了现在这样。他很快变得非常成功，且目前是我最高分的SCP。

__SCP-703__

这个是重写自“随机物品产生器”，基本就只是个能使随机东西出现的壁橱。我一直很喜欢，所以我自告奋勇的为它重写了。现在我已认为它是最好的一个，将原始文档作为出发点并完全重写的。在深思一段时间后，我决定让壁橱只有在想帮助你们时符合逻辑。噢，还有在事故中的黑条SCP是[[[SCP-643]]]

__SCP-1046__

好的，当我还是个孩子，我有极活跃的想象力，且能自行以四面体块（tetrahedron blocks，一种玩具）弄出小小人物和故事。其中一个叫“Messy先生”，一位有将他自身和墙壁融为一体的超能力，或是诸如此类。最后我忘掉了它，直到我开始回想我的孩提时代作为SCP点子时。我记起了Messy先生，并认为它实际上有令人恐惧的性质，作为房子一部分时。所以我改少它作为超能力的部分，并带出更多从原始点子中出自内心的恐惧，然后这就是我所想的SCP-1046。

__SCP-2600-J__

GeneralHarland给我了个用在SCP上的点子，一个闹鬼的十字入口，那里有个骑脚踏车的小孩被撞了。我对这有些瓶颈，直到Sal顺进聊天室且认为我在说关于-J文档的事。我们开始快速过目，然后在数小时后它变成了搞笑文档。

__SCP-2600__

我已经想得到这个SCP编号好多好多年了。自从我在基金会开始认真进行写作时。当竞赛改变风向时，我什么都不能想，并开始撰写任何我能得到的科幻概念。那个最后变成了SCP-2082。我最后得到了混搭MK-Ultra、Polybius和关于6个其它都市传说的点子。最后的成果是个没全都合理的SCP，但有许多有趣的细节，并提出了很多问题。我顺利完成然后整理了下，但它位于稳定的评分，且坦白说我不确定发生了什么事，且我不知道编辑的东西是否让它更好或是永远毁坏。

__SCP-2082__

我写了这个，因为猛犸象很酷，且我也想要让编号2082包含一些依稀涉及过去的东西，因为They Might Be Giants有首《2082》的歌就像这样。

__SCP-821__

在我读了“Dixie Before Disney”后我有了个点子，并想在SCP的上下文中谈及佛罗里达游乐园的历史。

__SCP-992__

这背后的中心原因在于，在原始文档中我们没真的得到一个明确的点子——这家伙的异常为何。所以我想有这玩笑般的点子在文档中，关于这这家伙的异常为何。他真的做过和知道他声称的一切，或是他充满了这些？在我脑海中，他是充满了这些，但并不像他（或基金会）所想的如此多。他得到了未开发的潜力，且他在预言家游戏中的同胞来说非常年轻。

[[/tab]]

[[tab 角色扮演人物]]

So, this is a little collection of all the RP characters I've created, listed with the games they were played in. Hopefully this is somewhat interesting, or at kills some time for you. I've been in quite a few rp's, not all of which I was active in, and as such have quite a few characters.

+++ **玩家名称**

Roget

+++ **姓名**

Ralph Bushnell

+++ **概念**

A guy who didn't really understand what he was getting into with this assignment, but does his best to cope with the situation.

+++ **Aspects**

**Wire Frame:**  Ralph is a very skinny man. He presents a smaller target, but is more fragile as a result.
**Explorer:** Ralph likes to explore any new area he finds himself in to the fullest. He might find neat stuff, but he also might get lost or thrown off track.
**Diplomacy:** Willing to try and defuse any situation with calm words. However, the diplomatic approach is not always the best idea.

+++ **技能**

* **Medical:** **8**

* **Persuasion:** **6**

* **Agility:** **6**
* **Strength:** **6**
* **Perception:** **7**

* **Ranged Weapons:** **5**
* **Melee Weapons:** **1**

* **Physical Defense:** **6**
* **Mental Defense:** **5**

* **Body:** **6**
* **Mind:** **5**

* **Action Points:** **3**
* **Load Limit:** **10**
* **Current Load:** **6**

* **XP Held:** **11**
* **XP Used:** **0**

+++ **Equipment**

Ralph possesses no equipment.

+++ **Possessions**

Possessions are organized by two sections:

**Load:**

* 9mm pistol (**+1 Load**)
* 9mm ammunition (**+1 Load**)
* Rope (**+1 Load**)
* Basic Medkit (**+2 Load**)
 * gauze
 * medicinal alcohol to prevent infection
 * bandages
 * two tourniquets 
 * one morphine syringe
 * one set for a crude on-site splint.
* Pocket (**+1 Load**)
 * Matches
 * Water (Bottled) 

**其它：**

* --Binoculars--
* --Bird books--
* --Magazines--
* --LaserDisc player--(Destroyed)
* --Hats--(Destroyed)
* --Shades--(Destroyed)
* Buddha Necklace from Adam
* Bottle cap with an apple pictured on it.
* Hay penny, circa 1940
* Photo of a boat, with "dream" written on it.
* Journal stolen from an alternate-dimension version of himself.

+++ **个人经历**

Dr.Ralph Bushnell was recruited from a hospital in Jacksonville after his work in successfully quarantining SCP-███. Did some minor odd work in medical before he was shipped off to the red pool with no real knowledge of what to expect. Since then, he has done his best to be useful and managed to outlive many of his peers. 

+++ **Miscellaneous**

|||| [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-rogets-file/RELPH.jpeg width="300px"]] ||
||||~ ^^Alleged photo of Dr.Bushnell^^ ||

Ralph has a doctorate in medicine. He can dance pretty well, but is terrible at Billiards. His hobbies are birding, reading about birds and watching films.

**//Name://** A. Kirsne
**//Concept://** A Prussian Infantryman whisked from the field to the House.
**//Faction://** House Native
**//Physical Health://** 7
**//Mental Health://** 7
**//XP://** 

__**技能**__ 
**Extreme Discipline:** 5 (Prussian Military Training has instilled him with the fortitude to stand his ground.)
**Rifleman:** 3 (Has military training in the use of his rifle, and firearms in general.)
**Battle Senses** 3 (Has lived through enough war to have a good sense of self-preservation.)

 __**Inventory**__
**Weapons:** 
* //Dreyse Needle Rifle// -- +1 to **Rifleman**

**Equipment:** 
* //Prussian Uniform// -- +1 to **Extreme Discipline** (His uniform gives him the confidence to act.)


 __**Perks**__ 

 __**Hooks**__ 
* //Help, I've fallen and I can't get up//: -2 penalty to the next 2 rolls anytime Kirsne is knocked to the floor. He is old and doesn't move like he used to .

 __**History**__ 
Was a soldier-then-officer in the Prussian Army, was dispatched to investigate some odd reports coming from an Austrian village. When they investigated, locals told them a local quarry had a strange door appear. He came into the Tamlin House from that door.

**What does your character fear?** 
The dark, the French, getting old.

**What are your character's goals?** 
Short term goal is to see his unit again, long term to see the unification of Lesser Germany.

**If your character could be an animal, which one would it be?** 
A yellowjacket.

**What is your character's dearest wish?** 
To see the Fatherland again before he dies.

**Why is your character here?** 
Was in Austria, walked in a door, now he's here.

**If your character had a tattoo, or another one, what would it be?** 
Prussian flag.

**If your character could have any superpower, what would it be?**
Eagle vision.

**What is your character's greatest weakness?** 
He is getting old, and he thinks he can do more than he can. 

**What is your character's greatest strength?** 
His extensive military training.

+++ Perks:

**Concentration:** 1 Point. You are really good at shutting out distractions. You may ignore any penalties for distractions.

**Approachable:** 1 Point. You are easily liked. you have a -1 difficulty to getting people to open up.

+++ Hooks:

**Superstitious:** 1 Point. Draco believes that all vegetables contain the spirits of royalty, especially cabbage, and that the protection of all living vegetables is a holy duty. You are at +1 difficulty to any roll immediately after violating a superstition.

**Wavering Faith:** 3 Points. You used to believe, but something has made you doubt the higher powers. All willpower roles are at +1 difficulty.

**Slow:** 3 Points. A quick walking pace is your best all-out sprint. +2 difficulty to stamina or other rolls when they require decisive movement.
+++ Powers:

N/A   

+++ Description:

Short and plump, with a full beard and shaved head. His hands seemed to be permanently ingrained with dirt from all the garden work he has done. He wears a pair of well worn overalls with a black wool shirt and leather boots. 

+++ Background:

Before coming to the house, Draco was one of the Kingdom of Elrichs royal gardeners. However, he had a greedy side and was selling royal vegetables on the black market. When he was caught, he was sentenced to banishment and thrown into a door leading into the Tamlin House.

+++ Total Freebie Points: 21 + 7 Hooks = 28

1 point to Athletics

2 points to Dodge 
1 point to Empathy
1 point to Craft
2 points to Melee
1 point to Medicine
1 point to Linguistics
1 point to Occult

+++ **Name**

R. J. Clinton

+++ **Concept**

Historian and Bookworm

+++ **Power**

//Well Read:// Clinton has done extensive research on alternate worlds culture, customs and history. Spending 1 AP to grants a +3 bonus to Lore or Foreign Culture.

+++ **Aspects**

//Wait I can still figure it out// Clinton loathes fighting and is hesitant to attack. He instead relies on his brain and is more willing to try and figure it out rather than attack.
//Diplomacy:// Clinton is willing to try and defuse any situation with calm words, rather than violence. However, the diplomatic approach is not always the best idea.
//Explorer:// Clinton likes to explore any new area he finds himself in to the fullest. Sometimes he can find neat stuff, but he also might get lost or thrown off track.

+++ **Skills**
* //Foreign Culture:// **4**
* //Lore:// **3**
* //Scholarship:// **4**
* //Perception:// **2**
* //MDef// **3**
* //PDef// **2**
* //Mind// **2**
* //Body:// **2**
* //Gun Combat// **2**

+++ **Possessions**

A collection of history books.
A red hat.
One revolver.
Binoculars.
Writing utensils.
Typewriter.


+++ **Personal History**

Robert J. Clinton has been a scholar and historian for as long as he can remember. His grandfather would take him up to the musty old study, and within they would study the treatise and essays on all the worlds cultures. All through his adolescent years, this nascent love of the histories stayed within him. He cut off the stranglehold of socialization and communication to focus on his studies, and his newfound collection of historical works. 

When he reached adulthood, he worked at a University, in the history department. Although he was widely known as one of the most droll members of the faculty, his wide bank of knowledge overcame the stigma. Clinton learned many new things at this stage of his life, but he always desired to learn more. After he'd completely gone through the University library, he went off to find an even more extensive type of knowledge. While traveling to find such a place, he found his way to the library.


|||| [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-rogets-file/Clinton%281%29.png width="300px"]] ||
||||~ ^^Alleged photograph of Professor Clinton^^ ||

+++ **Player Name**

Roget

+++ **Name**

Ted Mikelson

+++ **Concept**

Honest Newsman

+++ **Power**

**Trusted Anchorman:** Ted is a veteran anchorman, who's had years of experience in the field and behind a camera. His authoritative yet soothing tones make people want to believe in him. Spending 1 AP to grants a +3 bonus to Persuasion and Perception.

+++ **Aspects**

**Asks the tough questions:**  Ted must always know the truth, and will go to great lengths to obtain a satisfactory understanding of the situation. This can lead to him finding information he'd rather not know, in places he doesn't like, accompanied by people who aren't thrilled with him.
**Lets go to Ted for a live report:** Ted likes to explore any new area he is in to find new stuff. He tends to wander off.
**In Other News...:** Ted has a tendency to distract or derail the conversations of people he talks to.

+++ **Skills**

* **Athletics:** **1 (Average)**

Video Camera
--Microphone-- Traded for a cassette recorder
Pressed Suit
Briefcase containing ream of papers, coffee mug, and video tapes.
Small Knife
9mm Pistol


+++ **Personal History**

Ted was a news reporter for a local station when disaster struck. He was one of the last reporters on the air before his station lost power, forcing him to flee. 

+++ **Miscellaneous**

Ted is allergic to shellfish.
